pr_title: [HUDI-305] Add Hudi changes for Presto MOR query support

timeline.message:
Add changes for presto mor queries

Adds the neccessary changes to hudi for support of presto querying hudi
merge-on-read table's realtime view.

timeline.bodyText: @bschell where are we using this dependency ?
timeline.author: bhasudha

replies.bodyText: These are used by the HoodieParquetRealtimeRecordReader that is now being used for presto MOR realtime queries. The record reader will fail if these dependencies aren't there.
replies.author: bschell
